translations: （美）（政治上的）超然派；骑墙派；中立者；共和党独立派（1884年美国大选中拒绝支持本党候选人者）；大人物；印第安酋长

sentences.sentence: Mugwump. We didn't have to talk so kind, didn't you forget last experience?
sentences.translation: 老大！不必跟他们那么客气，难道您忘了上次惨痛的经验吗？

sentences.sentence: The head of the International Confederation of Wizards is called the Supreme Mugwump.
sentences.translation: 巫师国际联邦的首脑被称为最高会长。

sentences.sentence: The term "Mugwump" refers to a leader, derived from an Algonquian (a language of one of the American Indian tribes) word meaning "great chief. "
sentences.translation: “会长”这个词指领导者，是从一个阿尔冈琴语系的单词衍生而来，意为“伟大的首领”。
